name: test_e2e_with_logs[XSS_REFL_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_010` |
| **Name** | Video source onerror XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<video><source onerror=alert('XSS')>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cvideo%3E%3Csource%20onerror%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_XSS_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | DOM-based XSS Attack |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_REFL_010-1765111559619-4oyhot pattern_id=XSS_REFL_010 uri=/?q=%3Cvideo%3E%3Csource%20onerror%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET |
| **Match Status** | `MATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~13000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:45:59.000 UTC
